[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'bum cha pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@#/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_glegs bam drug pa/_bam po dang po/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can 
[\[1b.2\]]rnams lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan 
[\[1b.3\]]bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du 
[\[1b.4\]]sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/
[\[1b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa med pa'i 
[\[2a.2\]]chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur 
[\[2a.3\]]to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom 
[\[2a.4\]]pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[2a.5\]]kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[2a.6\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa 
[\[2b.2\]]nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[2b.3\]]dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[2b.4\]]nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_
[\[2b.5\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[2b.6\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[2b.7\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[3a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim 
[\[3a.3\]]bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha 
[\[3a.4\]]rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang 
[\[3a.5\]]ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[3a.6\]]dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[3a.7\]]shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[3b.2\]]phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong 
[\[3b.3\]]pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[3b.4\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid 
[\[3b.5\]]stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams 
[\[3b.6\]]yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[3b.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod 
[\[4a.2\]]do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/
[\[4a.3\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs 
[\[4a.4\]]rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i 
[\[4a.5\]]sems can rnams lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_
[\[4a.6\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_/
[\[4a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/_klag pa dang /_
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir/_gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de 
[\[4b.2\]]dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[4b.3\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 
[\[4b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs 
[\[4b.5\]]par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau 
[\[4b.6\]]shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[4b.7\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi 
[\[5a.2\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_
[\[5a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas 
[\[5a.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin 
[\[5a.5\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen 
[\[5a.6\]]po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klog pa dang /_
[\[5a.7\]]bri ba dang /_kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[5b.2\]]sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[5b.3\]]tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[5b.4\]]kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod 
[\[5b.5\]]do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[5b.6\]]'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes med 
[\[5b.7\]{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa 
[\[6a.2\]]nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[6a.3\]]nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[6a.4\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags 
[\[6a.5\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa 
[\[6a.6\]]brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/
[\[6a.7\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam 
[\[6b.2\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[6b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[6b.4\]]rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[6b.5\]]rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 
[\[6b.6\]]'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 
[\[6b.7\]]'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/
[\[7a.2\]]'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang 
[\[7a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[7a.4\]]rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu 
[\[7a.5\]]phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[7a.6\]]dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa 
[\[7a.7\]]nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[7b.2\]]bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[7b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 
[\[7b.4\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau 
[\[7b.5\]]shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang 
[\[7b.6\]]du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che 
[\[7b.7\]]zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[8a.2\]]tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[8a.3\]]chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha 
[\[8a.4\]]rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 
[\[8a.5\]]rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/
[\[8a.6\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid 
[\[8a.7\]]yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong ba nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid 
[\[8b.2\]]stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag 
[\[8b.3\]]par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags 
[\[8b.4\]]pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[8b.5\]]par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin 
[\[8b.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[8b.7\]]yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/
[\[9a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi 
[\[9a.3\]]bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[9a.4\]]mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[9a.5\]]gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab 
[\[9a.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur 
[\[9a.7\]]ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/
[\[9b.2\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[9b.3\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul 
[\[9b.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[9b.5\]]dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[9b.6\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[9b.7\]]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[10a.2\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so 
[\[10a.3\]]yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag 
[\[10a.4\]]kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de 
[\[10a.5\]]bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing 
[\[10a.6\]]mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i 
[\[10a.7\]]lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha 
[\[10b.2\]]rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad 
[\[10b.3\]]med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]
[\[10b.4\]]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[10b.5\]]min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan 
[\[10b.6\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don 
[\[10b.7\]]dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[11a.2\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/
[\[11a.3\]]byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs 
[\[11a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon 
[\[11a.5\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang 
[\[11a.6\]]dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 
[\[11a.7\]]'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de 
[\[11b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs 
[\[11b.3\]]kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[11b.4\]]'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 
[\[11b.5\]]'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau 
[\[11b.6\]]shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur 
[\[11b.7\]]to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur 
[\[12a.2\]]to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[12a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[12a.4\]]sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[12a.5\]]dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[12a.6\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[12a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa 
[\[12b.2\]]brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_
[\[12b.3\]]gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po 
[\[12b.4\]]dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[12b.5\]]mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de 
[\[12b.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 
[\[12b.7\]]rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 
[\[13a.2\]]yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod 
[\[13a.3\]]do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[13a.4\]]'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams 
[\[13a.5\]]yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye 
[\[13a.6\]]mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi 
[\[13a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[13b.2\]]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid 
[\[13b.3\]]stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/
[\[13b.4\]]stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/
[\[13b.5\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[13b.6\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so 
[\[13b.7\]]yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/
[\[14a.2\]]phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[14a.3\]]rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs 
[\[14a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[14a.5\]]'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri ba 
[\[14a.6\]]dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de 
[\[14a.7\]]dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par [{]gyurd [,]gyur [}]to/_/'thob bo/_/
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par [{]gyurd [,]gyur [}]to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa 
[\[14b.2\]]nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[14b.3\]]kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/
[\[14b.4\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[14b.5\]]dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen 
[\[14b.6\]]po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[14b.7\]]dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[15a.2\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[15a.3\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[15a.4\]]bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher 
[\[15a.5\]]bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de 
[\[15a.6\]]bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing 
[\[15a.7\]]mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs 
[\[15b.2\]]pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge 
[\[15b.3\]]ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[15b.4\]]'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam 
[\[15b.5\]]mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes med 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//_//
[\[15b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[15b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[16a.2\]]yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[16a.3\]]pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 
[\[16a.4\]]yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[16a.5\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig 
[\[16a.6\]]pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa 
[\[16a.7\]]shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad 
[\[16b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/
[\[16b.3\]]bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 
[\[16b.4\]]'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_
[\[16b.5\]]'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom 
[\[16b.6\]]pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs 
[\[16b.7\]]par gyur to/_/'jug go/_'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[17a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[17a.3\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos 
[\[17a.4\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga 
[\[17a.5\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par 
[\[17a.6\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[17a.7\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[17b.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che 
[\[17b.3\]]zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 
[\[17b.4\]]kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[17b.5\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i 
[\[17b.6\]]lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams 
[\[17b.7\]]yod do/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid 
[\[18a.2\]]yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong 
[\[18a.3\]]pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[18a.4\]]stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams 
[\[18a.5\]]yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod 
[\[18a.6\]]do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/
[\[18a.7\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/
[\[18b.2\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[18b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang 
[\[18b.4\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar 
[\[18b.5\]]gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam glag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 
[\[18b.6\]]'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_'jug 
[\[18b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[19a.2\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_'jag par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/
[\[19a.3\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[19a.4\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid 
[\[19a.5\]]dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan 
[\[19a.6\]]nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_
[\[19a.7\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[19b.2\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya 
[\[19b.3\]]cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 
[\[19b.4\]]'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim 
[\[19b.5\]]bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 
[\[19b.6\]]kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med 
[\[19b.7\]]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha 
[\[20a.2\]]rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes med 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin[,]min[}]/_/skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[20a.3\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang 
[\[20a.4\]]stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das 
[\[20a.5\]]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[20a.6\]]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams 
[\[20a.7\]]yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[20b.2\]]rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[20b.3\]]yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/
[\[20b.4\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[20b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[20b.6\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[20b.7\]]pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/
[\[21a.2\]]'jug go/_'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_thob 
[\[21a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang 
[\[21a.4\]]chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur 
[\[21a.5\]]ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[21a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das 
[\[21a.7\]]pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags 
[\[21b.2\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[21b.3\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_/
[\[21b.4\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab 
[\[21b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos 
[\[21b.6\]]thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi 
[\[21b.7\]]lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[22a.2\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i 
[\[22a.3\]]lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[22a.4\]]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/
[\[22a.5\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[22a.6\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad 
[\[22a.7\]]stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[22b.2\]]rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[22b.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so 
[\[22b.4\]]so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra 
[\[22b.5\]]bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa 
[\[22b.6\]]rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig 
[\[22b.7\]]rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/_sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]bkod na/_kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[23a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 
[\[23a.3\]]de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu 
[\[23a.4\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob 
[\[23a.5\]]par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs 
[\[23a.6\]]par gyur to/_/'jug go/_'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos 
[\[23a.7\]]de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 
[\[23b\]]
