[\[23b.1\]]nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog 
[\[23b.2\]]ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[23b.3\]]dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 
[\[23b.4\]]pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[23b.5\]]thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen 
[\[23b.6\]]po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_
[\[23b.7\]]kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[24a.2\]]dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi 
[\[24a.3\]]lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams 
[\[24a.4\]]yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu 
[\[24a.5\]]mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams 
[\[24a.6\]]yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan 
[\[24a.7\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa [(]stang [,]stong [)]pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[24b.2\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag 
[\[24b.3\]]par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod 
[\[24b.4\]]do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[24b.5\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/
[\[24b.6\]]so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom 
[\[24b.7\]]pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka 'og gi 
[\[25a.2\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la 
[\[25a.3\]]rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[25a.4\]]pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[25a.5\]]zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug 
[\[25a.6\]]go/_'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob 
[\[25a.7\]]po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon 
[\[25b.2\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[25b.3\]]tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[25b.4\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[25b.5\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_
[\[25b.6\]]dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 
[\[25b.7\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher 
[\[26a.2\]]bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 
[\[26a.3\]]'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/
[\[26a.4\]]khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul 
[\[26a.5\]]dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad 
[\[26a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[26a.7\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul 
[\[26b.2\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi 
[\[26b.3\]]nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[26b.4\]]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[26b.5\]]yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/
[\[26b.6\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[26b.7\]]'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong 
[\[27a.2\]]ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod 
[\[27a.3\]]do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka steng gi phyogs 
[\[27a.4\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes 
[\[27a.5\]]pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[27a.6\]]kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 
[\[27a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/
[\[27b.2\]]'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/
[\[27b.3\]]'jug go/_'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[27b.4\]]lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[27b.5\]]phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha 
[\[27b.6\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos 
[\[27b.7\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug 
[\[28a.2\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams 
[\[28a.3\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_
[\[28a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 
[\[28a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen 
[\[28a.6\]]bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 
[\[28a.7\]]yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[28b.2\]]'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye 
[\[28b.3\]]mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims 
[\[28b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong 
[\[28b.5\]]pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[28b.6\]]nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[28b.7\]]yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par 
[\[29a.2\]]thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/
[\[29a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod 
[\[29a.4\]]do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir 
[\[29a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//_//
[\[29a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gsum pa/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa 
[\[29a.7\]]dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/_/gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[29b.2\]]pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[29b.3\]]pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[29b.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_
[\[29b.5\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/_/de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni 'di yin te/_gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[29b.6\]]phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub 
[\[29b.7\]]par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[30a.2\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/
[\[30a.3\]]gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis 
[\[30a.4\]]pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_nang stong pa nyid 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[30a.5\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_phyi nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_stong pa nyid 
[\[30a.6\]]stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_chen po stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_don dam pa 
[\[30a.7\]]stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_'dus byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma 
[\[30b.2\]]yin pa'i blos/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[30b.3\]]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod 
[\[30b.4\]]pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis 
[\[30b.5\]]la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis 
[\[30b.6\]]la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[30b.7\]]byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_yang dag par spong ba rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_dbang po rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_stobs rnams tshul bzhin du 
[\[31a.2\]]yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[31a.3\]]lag brgyad pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_
[\[31a.4\]]bsam gtan rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i 
[\[31a.5\]]blos/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_rnam par thar pa brgyad tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[31a.6\]]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[31a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_mngon par shes pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]yang ma yin pa'i blos/_ting nge 'dzin rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la 
[\[31b.2\]]spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis 
[\[31b.3\]]la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_snying rje chen po tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[31b.4\]]byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_thams cad shes 
[\[31b.5\]]pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin 
[\[31b.6\]]pa'i blos/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du mar rgya cher rjod cing ston la/_'chad cing 'grel pa 
[\[31b.7\]]dang /_rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/_yang dag par ston cing de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/_kau shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su lta ba ma yin/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]lta ba ma yin/_mtshan mar ma yin/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma yin/_blang bar ma yin/_dor bar ma yin/_dbri bar ma yin/_bsnan par ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/_rnam par byang bar ma yin/_skye bar ma yin/_'gag par 
[\[32a.2\]]ma yin/_gzung bar ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung bar ma yin/_len par ma yin/_'dor bar ma yin/_gnas par ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnas par ma yin/_yang dag par ma yin/_log par ma yin/_ldan par ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ldan par ma yin/_'dre bar ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'dre bar ma yin/_rkyen 
[\[32a.3\]]du ma yin/_rkyen [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma yin/_chos su ma yin/_chos ma yin par ma yin/_de bzhin nyid du ma yin/_de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[32a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di/_gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston pa byed cing /_de'i don gtan la bab pa ston pa byed na bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/_bdag 'ba' shig gis bzung ba'am/_kun chub par byas 
[\[32a.5\]]pa 'am/_bcangs pa 'am/_blags pa 'am/_tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni ma yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig_/bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing /_kun chub par byed de/_'chang zhing klog la/_tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[32a.6\]]byed cing /_de gzhan la yang rgya cher rjod cing ston la/_'chad cing 'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/_yang dag par ston pa byed cing /_de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ni shin tu mang du 'phel lo/_/brgya byin gyis 
[\[32a.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la/_yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bgyi'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]ldan la yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya ste/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ni/_bsod nams kyi phung po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[32b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du [{]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_phreng ba dang spos dang /_byug pa dang phye ma dang /_na bza' dang gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang /_sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas ba dang bkur stir 
[\[32b.3\]]byas pa dang /_phu dud du byas pa dang mchod pa byas pa bas/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_
[\[32b.4\]]yang dag par bstan pa byas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[32b.5\]]rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[32b.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du [{]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_phreng ba dang spos dang /_byug pa dang phye ma dang /_na bza' dang gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/_rim gror byas 
[\[32b.7\]]pa dang /_bkur stir byas pa dang phu dud du byas pa dang mchod pa byas pa bas/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[33a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/_/
[\[33a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo la las/_nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag la/_nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs 
[\[33a.4\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /_bkur stir byas pa dang /_phu dud du byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa bas/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la 
[\[33a.5\]]la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/_bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas na/_rigs kyi 
[\[33a.6\]]bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[33a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_byang 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag la/_nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs 
[\[33b.2\]]dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/_rim gror byas pa dang /_bkur stir byas pa dang /_phu dud du byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa bas/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/_yi ge 
[\[33b.3\]]dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/_bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing /_rnam par phye ste/_gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[33b.4\]]pa 'di la bslabs te/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[33b.5\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag la/_nam 'tsho'i bar du me 
[\[33b.6\]]tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/_rim gror byas pa dang /_bkur stir byas pa dang /_phu dud du byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa bas/_kau 
[\[33b.7\]]shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod cing /_bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing /_rnam par phye ste/_gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]byas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[34a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_shar 
[\[34a.3\]]lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag la/_nam 'tsho'i bar du [{]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba 
[\[34a.4\]]dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /_bkur stir byas pa dang /_phu dud du byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa bas/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[34a.5\]]gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/_bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing /_rnam par phye ste/_gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i 
[\[34a.6\]]phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[34a.7\]]sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag la/_nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/_rim gror byas pa 
[\[34b.2\]]dang /_bkur stir byas pa dang /_phu dud du byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa bas/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/_
[\[34b.3\]]bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing /_rnam par phye stegs la ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/_'das pa 
[\[34b.4\]]dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs 
[\[34b.5\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag la/_nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_phreng 
[\[34b.6\]]ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /_bkur stir byas pa dang /_phu dud du byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa bas/_
[\[34b.7\]]kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/_bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing /_rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]pa byas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[35a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[35a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo la las/_'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag la/_nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[35a.4\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /_bkur stir byas pa dang /_phu dud du byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa bas/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[35a.5\]]tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/_bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing /_rnam par phye stegs la ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 
[\[35a.6\]]'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[35a.7\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag la/_nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /_
[\[35b.2\]]bkur stir byas pa dang /_phu dud du byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa bas/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/_bstan pa dang /_
[\[35b.3\]]bshad de bkrol zhing /_rnam par phye ste/_gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/_'das pa dang /_
[\[35b.4\]]ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon 
[\[35b.5\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bskal pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bskal pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[35b.6\]]pa'i tshul gyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bskal pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bskal pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[35b.7\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bskal pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bskal pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bas ni/_gang la 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing /_ston la 'chad cing /_rnam par 'god pa dang /_rab tu 'god cing /_rnam par 'byed la/_gsal bar 
[\[36a.2\]]byed cing /_yang dag par ston pa byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ni 'di yin te/_kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa gtong zhing /_'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa gtong ngo /_/
[\[36a.3\]]sbyin pa ni 'di gtong ngo /_/'di la ni sbyin pa bya'o snyam na/_des sbyin pa de ltar btang bas/_sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_tshul khrims srung zhing /_'di snyam du bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo /_/
[\[36a.4\]]tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam na/_des tshul khrims de ltar bsrungs pas/_tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur gyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa sgom zhing /_'di snyam du bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/_/bzod 
[\[36a.5\]]pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam na/_des bzod pa de ltar bsgoms pas/_bzod pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_brtson 'grus rtsom zhing /_'di snyam du bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/'di'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom 
[\[36a.6\]]mo snyam na/_des brtson 'grus de ltar brtsams pas/_brtson 'grus nyid du 'gyur gyi/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug cing /_'di snyam du bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 
[\[36a.7\]]'jug go/_/bsam gtan ni 'di dag la mnyam par gzhag go snyam na/_des bsam gtan la de ltar mnyam par bzhag pas/_bsam gtan nyid du 'gyur gyi/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab sgom zhing /_'di 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]snyam du bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/_/shes rab ni 'di sgom mo snyam na/_des shes rab de ltar bsgoms pas/_shes rab nyid du 'gyur gyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la spyod pas na/_sbyin 
[\[36b.2\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bsam 
[\[36b.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[36b.4\]]rdzogs par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_byang chub 
[\[36b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[36b.6\]]sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/_yongs su gtong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[36b.7\]]sbyin pa dang /_len pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/_tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/_bzod pa dang /_bzod pa sgom pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/_brtson 'grus dang /_brtson 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]'grus rtsom pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan dang /_bsam gtan sgom pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/_shes rab dang /_shes rab sgom pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[37a.2\]]so/_/kau shi ka de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[37a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar 
[\[37a.4\]]khong du chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/_/de ltar khong du chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/_/de ltar khong du chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par brtson 
[\[37a.5\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/_/de ltar khong du chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/_/de ltar khong du chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/_
[\[37a.6\]]yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/_/de ltar khong du chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams 
[\[37a.7\]]la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa 'byung ste/_der rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag gis kyang /_gzugs brnyan de thos nas/_lam stor bar 'gyur te/_de dag la shes rab kyi 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[37b.2\]]kyi bu mo dag/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to snyam zhing /_de dag gzugs brnyan ston pa byed pa'o/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_ji ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa lags/_/bcom ldan 
[\[37b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa byed pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston te/_de la 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan te/_'di ltar 
[\[37b.4\]]gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/_gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar ston/_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /_'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/_su la

[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de dag tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes

[\[38b\]]

[\[41a.4\]]'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/_su la bstan pa de dag kyang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam

[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]su la bstan pa de dag kyang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/_su la bstan pa de dag kyang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar

[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /_'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_zhes rjod de/_su la bstan pa de dag kyang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug

[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar ston/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /_'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do

[\[44a.3\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_yid 
[\[44a.4\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal lo

[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i 
[\[44b.2\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal la lo zhes bya bar ston/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar ston/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 
[\[44b.3\]]tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /_'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/_su la bstan pa de dag kyang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg

[\[44b.5\]]te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
[\[44b.6\]]pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal

[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]su la bstan pa de dag kyang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 
[\[45a.2\]]bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes

[\[45a.4\]]pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar ston/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar ston 
[\[45a.5\]]cing /_'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/_su la bstan pa de dag kyang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar

[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya

[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya

[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/skye mched drug [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_skye mched drug sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/_skye mched drug bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar

[\[48b.7\]]zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_reg pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]ston/_tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar ston/_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /_'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/_su la bstan pa de dag kyang /_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar rtog par

[\[64a.4\]]rjod de/_su la bstan pa de dag kyang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/

[\[64a.6\]]bar rtog pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal 
[\[64a.7\]]lo zhes bya bar ston/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar ston/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /_'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/_su la bstan pa de 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]dag kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[64b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_rnam pa 
[\[64b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur te/_kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag 
[\[64b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[64b.5\]]sa gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bzhi pa dang /_sa lnga pa dang /_sa drug pa dang /_sa bdun pa dang /_sa brgyad pa dang /_sa dgu pa dang /_sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/khyod kyis bsam 
[\[64b.6\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bzhi pa dang /_sa lnga pa dang /_sa drug pa dang /_sa bdun pa dang /_sa brgyad pa dang /_sa dgu pa 
[\[64b.7\]]dang /_sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bzhi pa dang /_sa lnga pa dang /_sa drug pa dang /_sa bdun pa dang /_sa brgyad pa dang /_sa dgu pa dang /_sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/
[\[65a.2\]]khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bzhi pa dang /_sa lnga pa dang /_sa drug pa dang /_sa bdun pa dang /_sa brgyad pa dang /_
[\[65a.3\]]sa dgu pa dang /_sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems 
[\[65a.4\]]dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bzhi pa dang /_sa lnga pa dang /_sa drug pa dang /_sa bdun pa dang /_sa brgyad pa dang /_sa dgu pa dang /_sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_khyod kyis sbyin pa'i 
[\[65a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bzhi pa dang /_sa lnga pa dang /_sa drug pa dang /_sa bdun pa dang /_sa brgyad pa dang /_sa dgu pa dang /_sa 
[\[65a.6\]]bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/zhes de yang mtshan ma'i tshul dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ston te/_de dus kyi 'du shes kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par 'gyur te/_kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no/_/kau shi ka 
[\[65a.7\]]gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]shig/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /_nyan thos kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes ston te/_kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no/_/kau shi 
[\[65b.2\]]ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na/_'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[65b.3\]]sgoms shig/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyis de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[65b.4\]]dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes/_rigs 
[\[65b.5\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na 'di skad ston te/_rigs kyi bu dag su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing /_'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid 
[\[65b.6\]]la byed pa de ni/_bsod nams kyi phung po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am 
[\[65b.7\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/_rjes su dga' bar gyis la/_bla 
[\[66a.2\]]na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag de ltar ston cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ston na/_rigs 
[\[66a.3\]]kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston pa lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 
[\[66a.4\]]'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces 
[\[66a.5\]]bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[66a.6\]]gang yin pa de la ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la gzugs nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab 
[\[66a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_

[\[66b.1\]]tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos

[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_'du byed kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_'du byed

[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau 
[\[67b.2\]]shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_
[\[67b.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_rna ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma ltar shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong
