[\[67b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag/_byang chub 
[\[67b.6\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_sna [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sna 
[\[67b.7\]]ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_sna'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_sna rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]so/_/de la sna nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan 
[\[68a.2\]]yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_
[\[68a.3\]]lce [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lce ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_lce'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[68a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_lce rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la lce nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes 
[\[68a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs 
[\[68a.6\]]kyi bu khyod kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_lus [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa 
[\[68a.7\]]de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_lus rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la lus nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi 
[\[68b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_yid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa 
[\[68b.3\]]de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_yid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la yid nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta 
[\[68b.4\]]ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[68b.5\]]bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_

[\[69a\]]

[\[70a.1\]]rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la chos nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]de la ni/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol

[\[71b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[71b.7\]]ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston 
[\[72a.2\]]to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms 
[\[72a.3\]]shig/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab 
[\[72a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar 
[\[72a.5\]]ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[72a.6\]]'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang

[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems

[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes 
[\[76a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_ma rig pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_ma rig pa'i rang bzhin

[\[76b.1\]]chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_

[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

[\[79b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/
[\[80a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[80a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau 
[\[80a.4\]]shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab 
[\[80a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 
[\[80a.6\]]gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag 
[\[80a.7\]]pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_phyi stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phyi stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin 
[\[80b.2\]]gyis stong ste/_phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de 
[\[80b.3\]]la phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub 
[\[80b.4\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_phyi nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[80b.5\]]zhe na/_phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces 
[\[80b.6\]]bya ba 'am [{]mye [,]me [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka 
[\[80b.7\]]gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha 
[\[81a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs 
[\[81a.3\]]kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[81a.4\]]phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chen po stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_chen po stong pa 
[\[81a.5\]]nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[81a.6\]]de la chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston te/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs 
[\[81a.7\]]kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig//_don dam pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu

[\[81b.4\]]rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang 
[\[81b.5\]]bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la 
[\[81b.6\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs 
[\[81b.7\]]kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_'dus ma byas 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos 
[\[82a.2\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am 
[\[82a.3\]]mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg 
[\[82a.4\]]pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de 
[\[82a.5\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

[\[82a.7\]]bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa 
[\[82b.2\]]stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/_/
[\[82b.3\]]de la thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang 
[\[82b.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang 
[\[82b.5\]]dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[82b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo

[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang 
[\[83a.2\]]bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la rang bzhin 
[\[83a.3\]]stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag_/pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang 
[\[83a.4\]]chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes 
[\[83a.5\]]su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

[\[83a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos

[\[83b.3\]]'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[83b.4\]]theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de 
[\[83b.5\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin 
[\[83b.6\]]pa de la ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi 
[\[83b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang 
[\[84a.2\]]yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[84a.3\]]nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub 
[\[84a.4\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de 
[\[84a.5\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni ngo bo nyid 
[\[84a.6\]]stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[84a.7\]]gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[84b.2\]]rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[84b.3\]]so/_/de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan 
[\[84b.4\]]yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[84b.5\]]rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes 
[\[84b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka 
[\[84b.7\]]de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_yang dag par spong ba rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yang dag par spong ba 
[\[85a.2\]]rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag 
[\[85a.3\]]ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/
[\[85a.4\]]kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[85a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[85a.6\]]ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi 
[\[85a.7\]]bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_dbang po rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dbang po rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab

[\[85b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu 
[\[85b.4\]]khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_stobs rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/
[\[85b.5\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la stobs nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston 
[\[85b.6\]]te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[85b.7\]]de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub

[\[86a.5\]]pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[86a.7\]]yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu

[\[86b.3\]]ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[86b.4\]]tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_bsam gtan rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsam gtan rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_bsam gtan 
[\[86b.5\]]rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la 
[\[86b.6\]]bsam gtan nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi 
[\[86b.7\]]bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[87a.2\]]gang yin pa de la ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[87a.3\]]pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[87a.4\]]phyin pa sgoms shig/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[87a.5\]]kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[87a.6\]]de la gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan 
[\[87a.7\]]yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_rnam par thar pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par thar pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes 
[\[87b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la rnam par thar pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[87b.3\]]mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs 
[\[87b.4\]]kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis

[\[87b.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de 
[\[87b.7\]]dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bdun pa/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[88a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[88a.3\]]gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba 
[\[88a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[88a.5\]]gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha 
[\[88a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mngon par shes pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[88b.2\]]rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_ting nge 'dzin rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[88b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni ting nge 'dzin

[\[88b.5\]]gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab 
[\[88b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[88b.7\]]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub 
[\[89a.2\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par 
[\[89a.3\]]rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

[\[89a.5\]]ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi 
[\[89a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang

[\[89b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes

[\[89b.6\]]de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_snying rje chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_snying rje

[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo

[\[90b.1\]]rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]bu rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[91a.2\]]gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/

[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[91b.2\]]sgoms shig/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa

[\[91b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong

[\[91b.7\]]ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]na rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/_chos gang las kyang 
[\[92a.2\]]yongs su 'da' bar ma byed cig/_chos gang las kyang gnas par ma byed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang las 'da' bar bya ba 'am gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de la [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos 
[\[92a.3\]]thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_blang bar bya ba 'am/_dor bar bya ba 'am/_bskyed par 
[\[92a.4\]]bya ba 'am dgag par bya ba'i chos gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[92a.5\]]pa'i don bstan par bya ste/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni ma yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs 
[\[92a.6\]]kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde 
[\[92a.7\]]bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_
[\[92b.2\]]ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau 
[\[92b.3\]]shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can lta zhog gi/_kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod 
[\[92b.4\]]na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[92b.5\]]kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di 
[\[92b.6\]]skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang 
[\[92b.7\]]du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_
[\[93a.2\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de 
[\[93a.3\]]bstan pa dang bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_
[\[93a.4\]]ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur 
[\[93a.5\]]bu'i sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[93a.6\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes 
[\[93a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[93b.2\]]kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[93b.3\]]kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[93b.4\]]ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa 
[\[93b.5\]]dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/
[\[93b.6\]]ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi 
[\[93b.7\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa lta zhog gi/_kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_
[\[94a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang 
[\[94a.3\]]dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan 
[\[94a.4\]]tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs 
[\[94a.5\]]kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang 
[\[94a.6\]]ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang 
[\[94a.7\]]dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_gling chen po bzhi'i 
[\[94b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/
[\[94b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod 
[\[94b.4\]]de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid 
[\[94b.5\]]la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[94b.6\]]kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[94b.7\]]la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di 
[\[95a.2\]]skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na/_ches 
[\[95a.3\]]de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod 
[\[95a.4\]]pa lta zhog gi/_stong pa gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i 
[\[95a.5\]]bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang 
[\[95a.6\]]ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_
[\[95a.7\]]chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi 
[\[95b.2\]]bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde 
[\[95b.3\]]bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol 
[\[95b.4\]]zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar 
[\[95b.5\]]bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gsum 
[\[95b.6\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi_/phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 
[\[95b.7\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam 
[\[96a.2\]]par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar 
[\[96a.3\]]bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 
[\[96a.4\]]gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/
[\[96a.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya 
[\[96a.6\]]cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul 
[\[96a.7\]]bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod par 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi/_sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong 
[\[96b.2\]]ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[96b.3\]]pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang 
[\[96b.4\]]'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches 
[\[96b.5\]]de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_stong 
[\[96b.6\]]gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol 
[\[96b.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_
[\[97a.2\]]tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod par 
[\[97a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 
[\[97a.4\]]rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas 
[\[97a.5\]]kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad 
[\[97a.6\]]du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na/_
[\[97a.7\]]ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]gi/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 
[\[97b.2\]]de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi 
[\[97b.3\]]ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs 
[\[97b.4\]]shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 
[\[97b.5\]]phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed 
[\[97b.6\]]pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde 
[\[97b.7\]]bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar 
[\[98a.2\]]bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan 
[\[98a.3\]]yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol 
[\[98a.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher 
[\[98a.5\]]brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul 
[\[98a.6\]]bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams 
[\[98a.7\]]yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la/_bkod pa lta zhog gi/_kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs 
[\[98b.2\]]kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[98b.3\]]pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 
[\[98b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi 
[\[98b.5\]]bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/
[\[98b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang 
[\[98b.7\]]dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]gyis shig/_ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can dgra bcom 
[\[99a.2\]]pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i 
[\[99a.3\]]rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par gzhan 
[\[99a.4\]]la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_tshul bzhin du yid 
[\[99a.5\]]la gyis shig/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka stong gnyis 
[\[99a.6\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam 
[\[99a.7\]]du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/_kun
