[\[120b.3\]]yang de bzhin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yang de bzhin/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang de bzhin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang de bzhin te/_gal te de ltar dngos po ji lta ba dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/_sems kyang de bzhin/_sbyin 
[\[120b.4\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin/_

[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ba rnams kyang de bzhin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin/_dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin/_stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang de bzhin/_'phags

[\[121a.4\]]bzhin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yang de bzhin/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang de bzhin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang de bzhin na ni/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/_
[\[121a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de ni gang zhig yin/_byang chub de ni gang zhig yin/_sems de ni gang zhig yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig yin/_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/_/byams pas smras pa/_gal te byang 
[\[121a.6\]]chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa/_sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su zin pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs 
[\[121a.7\]]pa dag ni/_dngos po de dag dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mtshan mar byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngo'i/_/de dag ni 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/_gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin no/_/gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du 
[\[123a.2\]]zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa 
[\[123a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams de ltar bstan pa ni/_

[\[123a.5\]]gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs 
[\[123a.6\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/thams cad shes pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du 
[\[123a.7\]]zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bshad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni de la dad pa tsam mam/_dga' ba tsam 
[\[123b.2\]]mam/_mos pa tsam mam/_gus pa tsam zhig yod pa de yang /[ {]myed [,]med [}]par gyur pa'i phyir te phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad cing bstan to/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas 
[\[123b.3\]]pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa 'di bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[123b.4\]]bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[123b.5\]]de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du phyi 
[\[123b.6\]]stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du phyi nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[123b.7\]]de'i mdun du chen po stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du don dam pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du 'dus byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i 
[\[124a.2\]]mdun du thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du rang bzhin stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/

[\[124a.5\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du yang dag par spong ba rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan 
[\[124a.6\]]par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du dbang po rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du stobs rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/

[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]bden pa rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du bsam gtan rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/

[\[124b.3\]]par 'jug pa dgu de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du mngon par shes pa rnams

[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]mdun du rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/des ni de thos na [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi 
[\[125a.2\]]rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_byams pa sems gang gis rjes su yi rang zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[125a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ba'i sems de ni zad cing 'gags pa/[ {]myed [,]med [}]de rnam par gyur/_dngos po de dag dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang zad cing 'gags la [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rnam par gyur na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i

[\[126a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i

[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[127a.2\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_dor ba 
[\[127a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_chos thams cad

[\[128a\]]

[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[128b.2\]]tshul dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed na/_des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_bzod 
[\[128b.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /_phyi nang stong 
[\[128b.4\]]pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid

[\[128b.7\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_dbang po rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]stobs rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[129a.2\]]rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la 
[\[129a.3\]]mos pa mang ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mos pa mang 
[\[129a.4\]]ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mos pa mang ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang /_thams 
[\[129a.5\]]cad shes pa nyid la mos pa mang pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes 
[\[129a.6\]]gnyen de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par ston par 'gyur te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/
[\[129a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_tshul khrims

[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral

[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon

[\[130b.5\]]ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas 
[\[130b.6\]]kyang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du 
[\[130b.7\]]ci nas kyang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar 
[\[131a.2\]]ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_snying rje chen po dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang 
[\[131a.3\]]bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/de la bdud kyi las rnams kyang ston par 'gyur te/_des bdud kyi las de dag thos nas/_'grib pa 'am/_'phel ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar bdud kyi las de dag la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[131a.4\]]do/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[131a.5\]]rigs yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rigs de dang yang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro//_//shes 
[\[131a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu pa/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/_shar phyogs dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_
[\[131a.7\]]byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs re re zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]pa dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhugs shing /_'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spros pa'i tshul chad par gyur pa/_tshig gi lam nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[131b.2\]]mnga' ba/_khur bor ba/_grong gi tsher ma rab tu bstsal pa/_srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su chad pa/_yang dag par yongs su mkhyen pas/_thugs shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi bsod nams 
[\[131b.3\]]mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /_de dag tu rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/_mtshe ma'am/_dga' ldan nam/_'phrul dga' 
[\[131b.4\]]'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dam/_tshangs ris sam/_tshangs lha nye phan nam/_tshangs pa kun 'khor ram/_tshangs chen nam/_snang ba'am/_chung snang ngam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'am/_kun snang dang ba 'am/_dge ba'am/_chung dge 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'am/_dge rgyas sam/_
[\[131b.5\]]che ba 'am/_chung che 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba 'am/_'bras bu che ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba 'am/_shin tu mthong ba 'am/_gya nom snang ba 'am/_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams sam/_sus kyang rung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig bskyed pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/_
[\[131b.6\]]gcig tu brtul nas/_tshad bzung ste/_rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa/_mchog phul/_gtso bo/_/gya nom pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang bar byas te/_rjes su yi rang bar byas nas kyang /_sems can 
[\[131b.7\]]thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad la sems shing bsams nas/_rjes su yi rang ba'i 
[\[132a.2\]]rab dam pa/_mchog phul/_gtso bo/_gya nom pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas/_rjes su yi rang nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/_ji ltar byang chub 
[\[132a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba yin/_sems phyin ci log tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba yin/_lta ba phyin ci log tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba yin/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sangs 
[\[132a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la/_sems kyang /_de la sangs rgyas su 'du shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_nyan thos su 'du shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa bar 'du shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur zhing /_sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems 
[\[132a.5\]]de la yang sems kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na/_de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/_'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gal te byang chub 
[\[132a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag dang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sems shing mtshan mar 'dzin la/_mtshan mar bzung nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su 
[\[132a.7\]]sngo na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sems gang gis sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sems pa'i sems de la yang /_yang dag par sems shing /_'di ltar zad pa la zad ces bya bar shes la/_gang zad pa des yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_sems gang gis yongs su sngo 
[\[132b.2\]]ba'i sems de nyid kyi chos nyid kyang de yin la/_chos gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de'i chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes/_gal te de ltar yongs su sngo na/_yang dag par yongs su sngo ba ste/_log pa ma yin no/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[132b.3\]]chen pos/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i 
[\[132b.4\]]bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /_de dag tu so so'i skye bo mang pos dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang /_chos bstan pa gang ji snyed cig thos pa dang /_de dag tu lha dang /_klu 
[\[132b.5\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang /_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/_khyim bdag 
[\[132b.6\]]gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams sam/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams sam/_mtshe ma'i lha rnams sam/_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams sam/_'phrul dga'i lha rnams sam/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams sam/_
[\[132b.7\]]tshangs ris kyi lha rnams sam/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams sam/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams sam/_tshangs chen gyi lha rnams sam/_snang ba'i lha rnams sam/_chung snang gi lha rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams sam/_kun snang dang ba'i lha 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]rnams sam/_dge ba'i lha rnams sam/_chung dge'i lha rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams sam/_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams sam/_che ba'i lha rnams sam/_chung che'i lha rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams sam/_'bras bu che ba'i lha 
[\[133a.2\]]rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams sam/_shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams sam/_gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams sam/_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos ji snyed cig thos te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[133a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad mngon par bsdus te/_gcig tu brtul nas/_tshad bzung ste/_rjes su yi rang ba'i rab mchog/_phul gtso bo dam pa/_gya nom pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa 
[\[133a.4\]]dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang nas/_de thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing /_gal te 'di ltar chos de dag ni zad do/_/'gags so/_/[{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par gyur to/_/gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yang /_rang 
[\[133a.5\]]bzhin gyis stong pa'o zhes/_gal te de ltar yongs su sngo na/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/_/gal te 'di ltar chos kyis chos yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin 
[\[133a.6\]]gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes la/_gal te de ltar yongs su sngo na/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam 
[\[133a.7\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes phyin ci log tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sems phyin 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]ci log tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub de yang 
[\[133b.2\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems de yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams 
[\[133b.3\]]bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyis dben par shes te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/_
[\[133b.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/_nang stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_phyi stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_
[\[133b.5\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_chen po stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 
[\[133b.6\]]nyid kyis dben par shes/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[133b.7\]]dben par shes/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]dben par shes/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis dben par shes/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis dben par shes/_dbang po rnams kyis dben par shes/_stobs rnams kyis dben par shes/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis 
[\[134a.2\]]dben par shes/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas dben par shes/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis dben par shes/_bsam gtan rnams kyis dben par shes/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis dben par shes/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[134a.3\]]kyis dben par shes/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis dben par shes/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus dben par shes/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas dben par shes/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis dben par shes/_
[\[134a.4\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis dben par shes/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis dben par shes/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus dben par shes/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhis dben par shes/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis dben par shes/_byams pa chen pos dben 
[\[134a.5\]]par shes/_snying rje chen pos dben par shes/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis dben par shes na/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[134a.6\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de/_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyi 
[\[134a.7\]]ngo bo nyid kyis dben par shes te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/mngon par 'du bya ba de dag ni/_mngon par 'du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/byang chub 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]kyi sems de ni/_byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/yongs su bsngo ba ni/_yongs su bsngo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/
[\[134b.2\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[134b.3\]]kyis dben no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[134b.4\]]ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni/_chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/don dam pa stong pa 
[\[134b.5\]]nyid ni/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/_mtha' las 'das 
[\[134b.6\]]pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/_rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[134b.7\]]nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/_dngos po 
[\[135a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/_yang dag par spong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[135a.3\]]rkang pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/dbang po rnams ni dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/stobs rnams ni stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/_byang chub kyi yan lag gi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 
[\[135a.4\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/bsam gtan rnams ni/_bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[135a.5\]]nyid kyis dben no/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/_rnam par thar pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[135a.6\]]dgu ni/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/
[\[135a.7\]]mngon par shes pa rnams ni/_mngon par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/_ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/_gzungs kyi sgo'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/_de bzhin 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/snying rje chen po ni/_snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/
[\[135b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no zhes bya bar shes na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des dben pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[135b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo na/_'di ltar yongs 
[\[135b.4\]]su bsngo bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba 'di yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/
[\[135b.5\]]sems gang gis bsngo ba'i sems de yang de dang tshul mthun te/_de'i ngo bo nyid do zhes/_gal te de ltar shes na/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/_de ltar yongs su bsngos na/_'du shes phyin ci log tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sems 
[\[135b.6\]]phyin ci log tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su shes 
[\[135b.7\]]na/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag kyang mtshan ma ma yin/_mtshan ma'i yul ma yin no zhes/_gal te de ltar sems na yang mtshan mar byed pa yin gyi/_
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/_de ltar na de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub

[\[136a.6\]]par bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/byams pas smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so zhes bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so 
[\[136a.7\]]zhes bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so zhes bya ba dang /_gang gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so zhes bya ba 'di skyon du smos par mi 'gyur ram snyam na 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_bdag gi lus de dag kyang 'gags par gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'gags par gyur/_mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang

[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]'dra bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 'du shes can la yongs su sngo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ni dug dang bcas pa/_mtshan ma dang bcas pa/_rgyu dang bcas pa/_rkyen dang bcas pa ste/_de de ltar yongs su bsngos na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[139a.2\]]la bskur par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba yang ma yin/_chos bzhin du smra ba yang ma yin par 'gyur te/_de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mos ji ltar na 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[139a.3\]]ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ste/_yongs su bsngo bar bya/_ji ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po 
[\[139a.4\]]bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar dang /_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar dang /_dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar du/_

[\[150a.1\]]de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang khongs su chud pa ma yin te/_gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/_'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/_/chos gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de yang

[\[153a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/_'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de ci'i phyir

[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/_'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[164a.2\]]yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang la rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rang byang chub gang 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs 
[\[164a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/_'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang la 
[\[164a.4\]]rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/_'das pa yang ma 
[\[164a.5\]]yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]do gang la rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[164a.6\]]nus so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/_'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/_
[\[164a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]do gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam pa'i chos nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/_'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la rang bzhin med do/_/

[\[164b.3\]]pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang la rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[164b.5\]]mtshan ma'i tshul lam/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo na de ni/_log par yongs su sngo ba yin gyi/_yang dag par yang yongs su sngo ba ma yin no/_/logs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa ma yin te/_
[\[164b.6\]]gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]bsngags pa'i yongs su bsngo ba des ni de'i/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su

[\[165a\]]

[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs

[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba des ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 
[\[166b.2\]]ma gyur pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de ni/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan 
[\[166b.3\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/_de ltar yongs 
[\[166b.4\]]su bsngos na/_yongs su bsngos pa'i rab tu 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid des/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[166b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[166b.6\]]'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang /_de bzhin nyid 
[\[166b.7\]]kyi tshul dang /_gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis ston pa ni/_rab 'byor khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam thob par gyur/_bsam 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]gtan bzhi thob par gyur/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi thob par gyur/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur/_mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sems can de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus 
[\[167a.2\]]mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yongs su bsngo bas 
[\[167a.3\]]yongs su bsngo ba de'i/_bsod nams ni/_ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni/_rab ces bya'o/_/gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/dam pa zhes bya'o/_/phul zhes bya'o/_/
[\[167a.4\]]mchog ces bya'o/_/gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur/_lan 
[\[167a.5\]]cig phyir 'ong bar gyur/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong bar gyur/_dgra bcom par gyur te/_de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong bar gyur pa dang /_dgra bcom par gyur pa de dag 
[\[167a.6\]]thams cad la nam 'tsho'i bar du gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod pa byas na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod 
[\[167a.7\]]nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yongs su 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni/_rab ces bya'o/_/gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/dam pa zhes bya'o/_/phul zhes bya'o/_/mchog 
[\[167b.2\]]ces bya'o/_/gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur te/_de la 
[\[167b.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs 
[\[167b.4\]]kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags 
[\[167b.5\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni/_rab ces bya'o/_/gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/dam pa zhes bya'o/_/phul zhes 
[\[167b.6\]]bya'o/_/mchog ces bya'o/_/gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[167b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/_de la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang /_gos dang /_bsod 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_
[\[168a.2\]]lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos bskal 
[\[168a.3\]]pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag 
[\[168a.4\]]thams cad kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang /_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas 
[\[168a.5\]]te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang /_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[168a.6\]]mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig 
[\[168a.7\]]rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang /_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag 
[\[168b.2\]]thams cad kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang /_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod 
[\[168b.3\]]par byas te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re 
[\[168b.4\]]re la yang /_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas 
[\[168b.5\]]pa dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang /_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi 
[\[168b.6\]]dang /_yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems 
[\[168b.7\]]can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang /_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_rim gror byas/_bkur stir 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_byang chub 
[\[169a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang /_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtse dang /_yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas te/_bde ba'i 
[\[169a.3\]]yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[169a.4\]]tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dpe bgyi bar yang dag pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la gzugs mchis su lags na ni/_'jig rten 
[\[169a.5\]]gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang shong bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge 
[\[169a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yongs su bsngo bas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/_rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni rab 
[\[169a.7\]]ces bya'o/_/gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/dam pa zhes bya'o/_/phul zhes bya'o/_/mchog ces bya'o/_/gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag 
[\[169b.2\]]khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_
[\[169b.3\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 'du shes can no/_/de ltar sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad lan cig 
[\[169b.4\]]phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong bar gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa de dag la/_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_
[\[169b.5\]]yo byad mang pos rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_phu dud du byed/_mchod par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 'du shes can no/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang 'grogs te/_
[\[169b.6\]]thal mo sbyar nas dga' ba'i yid kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_chags pa ma mchis 
[\[169b.7\]]pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing /_ci nas kyang gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_gnyis ma lags par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]yongs su sngo ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos 
[\[170a.2\]]dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/_lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing /_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha 
[\[170a.3\]]rdzas kyi bdug spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/_/rab tu

[\[170a.6\]]rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_/de nas lha'i bu rab mtshe ma mtshe ma'i lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[170a.7\]]me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing /_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan de

[\[170b.3\]]ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing /_ci nas kyang gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_gnyis ma lags par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de 
[\[170b.4\]]ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o/_/de nas lha'i bu rab dga' ldan dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha 
[\[170b.5\]]rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/_lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing /_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang lha rdzas kyi phreng ba 
[\[170b.6\]]dang lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/_/rab tu gtor to/_/mngon par gtor to/_
[\[170b.7\]]'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing /_ci nas kyang gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_gnyis ma lags par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su 
[\[171a.2\]]bsngo ba shin tu che'o/_/de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha 
[\[171a.3\]]rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/_lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing /_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[171a.4\]]byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/_rab tu gtor to/_/mngon par gtor to/_/'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/_
[\[171a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag
