[\[171a.7\]]byed gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/_lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing /_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas 
[\[171b.2\]]kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/_/rab tu gtor to/_/mngon par gtor to/_/'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[171b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing /_
[\[171b.4\]]ci nas kyang gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_gnyis ma lags par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 
[\[171b.5\]]'das gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/_
[\[171b.6\]]rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/_dbyangs su brjod do/_/de nas tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[171b.7\]]stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pas 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/zhes sgrar bsgrags te/_dbyangs 
[\[172a.2\]]su brjod do/_/de nas dge rgyas kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[172a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/
[\[172a.4\]]zhes sgrar bsgrags te/_dbyangs su brjod do/_/de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[172a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis 
[\[172a.6\]]mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/_dbyangs su brjod do/_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[172a.7\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/_dbyangs su brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang /_'phrul 
[\[172b.2\]]dga'i lha rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag gal te/_
[\[172b.3\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das pa dang /_ma 
[\[172b.4\]]byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba de dag thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa nas/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /_sems can thams cad kyi/_sbyin 
[\[172b.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_sbyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_
[\[172b.6\]]brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_tshul khrims kyi phung po 'am/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 'am/_shes rab kyi phung po 'am/_rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'am/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung bo 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan 
[\[172b.7\]]dag kyang rung ste/_de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas rjes su yi rang bar byas la/_de ltar rjes su yi rang nas kyang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa bas/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang /_bla 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/_des 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa dag gi/_sems dang po bskyed 
[\[173a.2\]]pa nas/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[173a.3\]]'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_
[\[173a.4\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po 
[\[173a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_
[\[173a.6\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[173a.7\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'am/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[173b.2\]]dam/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul du/_rjes su yi rang 
[\[173b.3\]]ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_mchog dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pas rjes su yi rang nas/_rjes su yi rang ba 
[\[173b.4\]]dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_rigs 
[\[173b.5\]]kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro/_stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang bye ba stong gi cha dang bye ba 
[\[173b.6\]]brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_mchog ces 
[\[173b.7\]]bya'o/_/gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/dam pa zhes bya'o/_/rab ces bya'o/_/phul zhes bya'o/_/gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/_gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste/_
[\[174a.2\]]rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_mchog dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang bar byed do/_/
[\[174a.3\]]zhes bka' stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/_rjes su yi rang ba'i dam par 'gyur/_ji tsam gyis na/_rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_mchog dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla na ma mchis pa dang /_gong na ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[174a.4\]]mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[174a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi len [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba dang /_mi rlom [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jum zhing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[174a.6\]]yang ma yin la/_de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'gag pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_de chos de dag la 'grib pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'phel ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'ong ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'gro ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_
[\[174a.7\]]phung por 'gyur ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/zhes rnam grangs de lta bus/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/rjes su yi rang nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba de ni dam par 'gyur te/_
[\[174b.2\]]rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni/_gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_mchog dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba 'di la ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi 
[\[174b.3\]]rang ba gzhan thams cad kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ste/_rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni de 
[\[174b.4\]]ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan pas rab ces bya'o/_/gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/dam pa zhes bya'o/_/mchog ces bya'o/_/phul zhes bya'o/_/gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[174b.5\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de 
[\[174b.6\]]dag dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[174b.7\]]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ji snyed pa dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ji snyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod na/_'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni gzugs so/_/rnam par grol 
[\[175a.2\]]ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni tshor ba'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni 'du shes so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni 'du byed do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni khams rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta 
[\[175a.3\]]bu ni skye mched rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_
[\[175a.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[175a.5\]]rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_nang stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_phyi stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_phyi nang stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta 
[\[175a.6\]]ba de lta bu ni/_chen po stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_'dus byas stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de 
[\[175a.7\]]lta bu ni/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rnam 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[175b.2\]]nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta 
[\[175b.3\]]bu ni/_yang dag par spong ba rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_dbang po rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_stobs rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_byang 
[\[175b.4\]]chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_bsam gtan bzhi'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de 
[\[175b.5\]]lta bu ni/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_rnam par thar pa brgyad do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[175b.6\]]dgu'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba 
[\[175b.7\]]ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/_/
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_snying rje chen po'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o/_/rnam par 
[\[176a.2\]]grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_mos pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_
[\[176a.3\]]da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag go/_rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_
[\[176a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_nyan thos de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_rang sangs rgyas rnams so/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_rang sangs 
[\[176a.5\]]rgyas de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag gi chos nyid do/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu 
[\[176a.6\]]ni/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid do zhes/_de ltar chos ma chags pa dang /_ma bcings pa dang /_ma grol ba dang /_ma zhen pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos ma skyes pa dang /_yongs su ma skyes pa dang /_
[\[176a.7\]]ma byung ba dang /_ma 'gag pa'i chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'pho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'jig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rjes su 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]yi rang ba'i rab bo/_/rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_mchog dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub 
[\[176b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[176b.3\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang /_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig 
[\[176b.4\]]bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang /_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang /_
[\[176b.5\]]byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[176b.6\]]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs 
[\[176b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji 
[\[177a.2\]]snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang /_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang /_
[\[177a.3\]]steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[177a.4\]]rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_nam 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims ca dang /_snyun kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang po dang /_bde ba thams 
[\[177a.5\]]cad kyis rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /_de dag gi ring bsrel la nyin mtshan du me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug 
[\[177a.6\]]pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba'i don du nyams su len cing /_de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_sbyin pa byin pa dang /_de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[177a.7\]]tshul gyis/_tshul khrims srung ba dang /_de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_bzod pa sgom pa dang /_de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab sgom 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]babs/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa gang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang /_
[\[177b.2\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[177b.4\]]char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzod 
[\[177b.5\]]de/_yongs su bsngo ba de nyid rab ces bya'o/_/gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/dam pa zhes bya'o/_/mchog ces bya'o/_/phul zhes bya'o/_/gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_byang chub sems

[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]bzhi'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang bar bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[178a.2\]]phyin pa ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_khams gsum pa thams cad kyi ma gos pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[178a.3\]]phyin pa ni/_nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i mun pa thams cad bstsal ba la rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi nang na/_mchog tu bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[178a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_'tshe ba thams cad rab tu byang ba'i slad du/_bde bar bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can thams cad kyis/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]lnga yongs su thob par bgyi ba la snang bar 
[\[178a.5\]]bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sems can shul gol par zhugs pa rnams/_mtha' las bzlog pa'i slad du shul ston pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i/_nyon mongs pa 
[\[178a.6\]]thams cad spang ba la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos skyed pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[178a.7\]]pa ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du ma skyes ma 'gag pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jig pa'i slad du 'khor ba'i gnyen po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_chos rin po che thams cad stobs 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]pa'i slad du/_sems can mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_thub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du stobs bcu bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_'gro ba dang ldog pa ma mchis 
[\[178b.2\]]pa'i slad du/_rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du 'khor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[178b.3\]]sems dpa' 'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/_nyan thos sam/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha 
[\[178b.4\]]ra dwa ti'i bu ston pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/ston pa la ji ltar phyag bya ba de bzhin du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/_ston pa yang 
[\[178b.5\]]gzhan ma yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/_ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa'o/_/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[178b.6\]]sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ngo /_/rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ngo /_/dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung ngo /_/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams 'byung ngo /_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'byung ngo /_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'byung 
[\[178b.7\]]ngo /_/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'byung ngo /_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi 
[\[179a.2\]]nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[179a.3\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[179a.4\]]pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden 
[\[179a.5\]]pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon 
[\[179a.6\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[179a.7\]]'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ngo /_/
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i zhu ba 'di gang las skyes/_ci'i rgyu snyam pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[179b.2\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/_yongs su bzung ba rnams ni/_thabs mkhas pas 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[179b.3\]]ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa de dag dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas na/_bdag gi zhu ba skyes so/_/kau shi 
[\[179b.4\]]ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon to/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[179b.5\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon to/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_dmus long brgya 'am/_stong ngam/_brgya phrag stong yang rung ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]bu [{]myed [,]med [}]par lam du 'jug par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_grong khyer du 'gro bar lta ga la nus/_kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga 
[\[179b.6\]]po 'di dag ni/_dmus long lta bur gyur pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de dag la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]bu [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_byang chub kyi lam yang skyed [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du 'jug par lta ga la nus/_kau shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[179b.7\]]lnga nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/_yongs su zin par gyur pa de'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]dang ldan par gyur te/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob bo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_gang 'di skad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob bo/_/zhes smras na/_btsun pa sha ra dwa 
[\[180a.2\]]ti'i bu de ni der yang ma zad de/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob bo/_/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob bo/_/pha rol tu phyin 
[\[180a.3\]]pa lnga ni/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob bo/_/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob bo/_/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[180a.4\]]pas yongs su bzung yang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob bo/_/smras pa/_de ltar ma yin te/_kau shi ka de ni de ltar ma yin no/_/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/_tshul khrims

[\[203b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]ji lta ba dang /_mtshan ma ji lta ba dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa yin no/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar thob par bgyid pa lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[203b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]len pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba dang /_mngon par chags pa med pa/_de ltar thob par byed de/_gang yang thob par byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_chos thams cad thob

[\[203b.6\]]pa ma mchis pa dang /_'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_nye bar gnas pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_

[\[215b.2\]]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_
[\[215b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes 
[\[215b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_rnam par thar pa rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes 
[\[215b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[215b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[215b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_mngon par shes pa rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[216a.2\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[216a.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[216a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[216a.5\]]rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor snying rje chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_
[\[216a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_snying rje chen po la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes 
[\[216a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[216b.2\]]tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid 
[\[216b.3\]]ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar 
[\[216b.4\]]na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_dgra bcom pa nyid la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rang byang chub tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[216b.5\]]yid ches pas/_rang byang chub la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_lam 
[\[216b.6\]]gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_rnam pa 
[\[216b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rgyu 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]gang gis na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/_pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo yin/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_gzugs che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/tshor ba che bar mi bgyid

[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]pa rnams che bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid chung bar mi bgyid do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams che bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid chung bar mi bgyid do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams che bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid chung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan

[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]bgyid do/_/sna 'du bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid yangs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/lce 'du bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid yangs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/lus 'du bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid yangs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/yid 'du bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid yangs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/gzugs 'du bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid

[\[222a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/rga shi tshad mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad

[\[222a.5\]]stong pa nyid tshad mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 
[\[222a.6\]]tshad mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong

[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]nyid tshad mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par mi bgyid tshad ma mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid tshad ma mchis par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/rnam par thar pa 
[\[225a.2\]]brgyad rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid/_rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid 
[\[225a.3\]]rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/de bzhin 
[\[225a.4\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do/_/snying rje chen po rgya 
[\[225a.5\]]chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid rgya chung ngur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i

[\[234b.1\]]do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad tshad yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu tshad yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu tshad yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]'du shes su gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'du shes su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[237a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten/_tshul khrims kyi 
[\[237a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la brten/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_gzugs mthu dang ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_mthu [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/tshor ba mthu dang ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_mthu [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/'du shes mthu dang 
[\[237a.4\]]ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_mthu [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/'du byed mthu dang ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_mthu [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/rnam par shes pa mthu dang ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_mthu [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]mthu dang ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed mthu 
[\[237a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do rna ba mthu dang ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_mthu [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/sna mthu dang ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_mthu [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/lce mthu dang ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_mthu [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/lus mthu dang ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_mthu [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/yid mthu

[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang lce che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang lus che bar bgyid

[\[240a.7\]]gang sna'i rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang lce'i rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang lus kyi rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang yid kyi rnam par shes pa che bar

[\[245b.1\]]yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras

[\[245b.3\]]bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang chu'i khams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams 'du bar 
[\[245b.4\]]bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rlung gi khams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/
[\[245b.5\]]gang nam mkha'i khams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol

[\[246b.1\]]pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma

[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang

[\[250a\]]

[\[250a.2\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes

[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rlung gi khams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang nam mkha'i khams 
[\[250b.2\]]tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab 
[\[250b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang ma rig pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang 'du byed tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am 
[\[250b.4\]]tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rnam par shes pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags 
[\[250b.5\]]so/_/gang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang skye mched drug tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de 
[\[250b.6\]]ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang reg pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang tshor ba tshad 
[\[250b.7\]]mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang sred pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang len pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang srid pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[251a.2\]]tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang skye ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang 
[\[251a.3\]]rga shi tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi 
[\[251a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[251a.5\]]pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[251a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang nang stong pa nyid tshad mchis par 
[\[251a.7\]]bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang phyi stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]bu ma lags so/_/gang phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma

[\[251b.3\]]lags so/_/gang don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par 
[\[251b.4\]]bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/
[\[251b.5\]]gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad 
[\[251b.6\]]ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 
[\[251b.7\]]'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad mchis par 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_
[\[252a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang dngos 
[\[252a.3\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_
[\[252a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so//_//

[\[253a\]]

[\[253b\]]

[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang sna'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang lce'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung

[\[254b.6\]]lags so/_/gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid

[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]lags so/_/gang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang sna'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[255a.2\]]las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab 
[\[255a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang yid 
[\[255a.4\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang sa'i khams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_shes
