[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis bar bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang sa'i 
[\[260a.2\]]khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang chu'i khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes 
[\[260a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rlung gi khams mthu dang 
[\[260a.4\]]ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang nam mkha'i khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[260a.5\]]tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rnam par shes pa'i khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang ma rig pa mthu dang 
[\[260a.6\]]ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang 'du byed mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[260a.7\]]phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rnam par shes pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs mthu 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang skye mched drug mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes 
[\[260b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang reg pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang tshor ba 
[\[260b.3\]]mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang sred pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi 
[\[260b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang len pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang srid pa mthu dang ldan par 
[\[260b.5\]]bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang skye ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun 
[\[260b.6\]]pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rga shi mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu 
[\[260b.7\]]ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang brtson 'grus 
[\[261a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis 
[\[261a.3\]]par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang nang stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma 
[\[261a.4\]]lags so/_/gang phyi stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang phyi nang stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu 
[\[261a.5\]]ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 
[\[261a.6\]]'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang chen po stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang don dam pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan 
[\[261a.7\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang mtha' las 
[\[261b.2\]]'das pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis 
[\[261b.3\]]par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma 
[\[261b.4\]]lags so/_/gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma 
[\[261b.5\]]mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras 
[\[261b.6\]]bu ma lags so/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[261b.7\]]mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]ma lags so/_/gang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 
[\[262a.2\]]mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang yang dag par spong ba rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[262a.3\]]phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang dbang po rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid 
[\[262a.4\]]pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang stobs rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras 
[\[262a.5\]]bu ma lags so/_/gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid 
[\[262a.6\]]pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 
[\[262a.7\]]mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang bsam gtan rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[262b.2\]]pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rnam par thar pa brgyad mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[262b.3\]]'jug pa dgu mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 
[\[262b.4\]]'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang mngon par shes pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun 
[\[262b.5\]]pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang ting nge 'dzin rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[262b.6\]]mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun 
[\[262b.7\]]pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang snying rje chen po mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun 
[\[263a.2\]]pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[263a.3\]]pa'i 'bras bu mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma 
[\[263a.4\]]mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 
[\[263a.5\]]'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang dgra bcom pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang rang byang chub mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu 
[\[263a.6\]]ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang lam gyi rnam pa shis pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun 
[\[263a.7\]]pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/gang byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_tshor ba che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_'du shes che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_'du byed che bar 
[\[263b.2\]]bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung 
[\[263b.3\]]bar bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_sna che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_lce che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_lus che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_yid che bar bgyid pa 
[\[263b.4\]]'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_sgra che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid 
[\[263b.5\]]pa 'am/_dri che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_ro che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_reg che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_chos che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[263b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 
[\[263b.7\]]'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am de ni/
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar 
[\[264a.2\]]bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa che 
[\[264a.3\]]bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bache bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te 
[\[264a.4\]]reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bache bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bache bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bache bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_lus 
[\[264a.5\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bache bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bache bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab 
[\[264a.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sa'i khams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_chu'i khams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rlung gi 
[\[264a.7\]]khams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_nam mkha'i khams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ma rig pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_'du byed che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang 
[\[264b.2\]]gzugs che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_skye mched drug che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_reg pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_tshor ba che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_sred pa che bar bgyid 
[\[264b.3\]]pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_len pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_srid pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_skye ba che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rga shi che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa de 
[\[264b.4\]]ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar bgyid pa 
[\[264b.5\]]'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[264b.6\]]chung bar bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_phyi stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar 
[\[264b.7\]]bgyid pa 'am/_phyi nang stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_chen po stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_don dam pa stong pa nyid che 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_'dus byas stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_mtha' las 'das pa stong 
[\[265a.2\]]pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid che 
[\[265a.3\]]bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid che bar 
[\[265a.4\]]bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[265a.5\]]chung bar bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_yang dag par spong 
[\[265a.6\]]ba rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_dbang po rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_stobs rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[265a.7\]]chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]bar bgyid pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[265b.2\]]rnam par thar pa rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[265b.3\]]pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[265b.4\]]rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi che bar bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[265b.5\]]chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_snying rje chen po che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 
[\[265b.6\]]de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu che bar bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[265b.7\]]chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_rang byang chub che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa 'am/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid che bar 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams che bar bgyid pa 'am/_chung bar 
[\[266a.2\]]bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_tshor ba 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_'du 
[\[266a.3\]]shes 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_'du byed 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes 
[\[266a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_sna 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_lce 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid 
[\[266a.5\]]pa 'am/_lus 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_yid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs 'du bar 
[\[266a.6\]]bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_sgra 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_dri 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_ro 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_reg 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par

[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]pa 'am/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi 
[\[266b.2\]]rnam par shes pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[266b.3\]]tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te 
[\[266b.4\]]reg pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[266b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par 
[\[266b.6\]]bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 
[\[266b.7\]]tshor ba 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sa'i khams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_chu'i khams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rlung gi 
[\[267a.2\]]khams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_nam mkha'i khams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur 
[\[267a.3\]]ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ma rig pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_'du byed 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[267a.4\]]yangs par bgyid pa 'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_skye mched drug 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_reg pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_tshor ba 'du bar

[\[267a.6\]]'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rga shi 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'du bar bgyid 
[\[267a.7\]]pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'du bar bgyid pa 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa 
[\[267b.2\]]nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_phyi stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_phyi nang stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 
[\[267b.3\]]'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_chen po stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_don dam pa stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_'dus byas stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs 
[\[267b.4\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[267b.5\]]yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs 
[\[267b.6\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs 
[\[267b.7\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_yang dag par spong ba rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par 
[\[268a.2\]]bgyid pa 'am/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_dbang po rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_stobs rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_byang 
[\[268a.3\]]chub kyi yan lag rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par 
[\[268a.4\]]bgyid pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par 
[\[268a.5\]]bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa brgyad 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[268a.6\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid 
[\[268a.7\]]pa 'am/_ting nge 'dzin rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par

[\[268b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'du bar bgyid pa 
[\[268b.4\]]'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_rang byang chub 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_
[\[268b.5\]]de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'du bar bgyid pa 'am/_yangs par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i dmigs pa chen por 
[\[268b.6\]]'gyur ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu ba/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par 
[\[268b.7\]]bgyid pa 'am/_tshor ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'du shes tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'du byed tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]shes pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis 
[\[269a.2\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sna tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lce tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lus tshad mchis par bgyid 
[\[269a.3\]]pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_yid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs tshad mchis par 
[\[269a.4\]]bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sgra tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_dri tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_ro tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid 
[\[269a.5\]]pa 'am/_reg tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_chos tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[269a.6\]]spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[269a.7\]]tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad mchis par 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i 
[\[269b.2\]]'dus te reg pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 
[\[269b.3\]]'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[269b.4\]]de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma 
[\[269b.5\]]mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lus 
[\[269b.6\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 
[\[269b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sa'i khams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_chu'i khams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]pa 'am/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rlung gi khams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_nam mkha'i khams tshad mchis par 
[\[270a.2\]]bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[270a.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_ma rig pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'du byed tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par 
[\[270a.4\]]bgyid pa 'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_skye mched drug tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_reg pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis 
[\[270a.5\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_tshor ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sred pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_len pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[270a.6\]]srid pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_skye ba tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rga shi tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen 
[\[270a.7\]]por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[270b.2\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid tshad mchis 
[\[270b.3\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_phyi stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad 
[\[270b.4\]]mchis par bgyid pa 'am tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_chen po stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad mchis par 
[\[270b.5\]]bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am 
[\[270b.6\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad mchis par 
[\[270b.7\]]bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[271a.2\]]tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes 
[\[271a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_yang dag par spong ba rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[271a.4\]]gyi rkang pa rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_dbang po rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_stobs rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[271a.5\]]byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshad mchis par 
[\[271a.6\]]bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[271a.7\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa brgyad tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa tshad mchis par bgyid pa 
[\[271b.2\]]'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_ting 
[\[271b.3\]]nge 'dzin rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis 
[\[271b.4\]]par bgyid pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_snying rje chen po tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[271b.5\]]tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lan 
[\[271b.6\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma 
[\[271b.7\]]mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rang byang chub tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshad mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom 
[\[272a.2\]]ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_'du shes rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid 
[\[272a.3\]]pa 'am/_'du byed rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[272a.4\]]tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_sna rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_lce rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_lus rgya chen 
[\[272a.5\]]por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_yid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[272a.6\]]rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_sgra rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_dri rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_ro rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_reg rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 
[\[272a.7\]]'am/_chos rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa rgya 
[\[272b.2\]]chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus 
[\[272b.3\]]te reg pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por bgyid 
[\[272b.4\]]pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[272b.5\]]ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i 
[\[272b.6\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid 
[\[272b.7\]]pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor brgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sa'i 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]khams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_chu'i khams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rlung gi khams rgya chen por 
[\[273a.2\]]bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_nam mkha'i khams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom 
[\[273a.3\]]ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ma rig pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_'du byed rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur 
[\[273a.4\]]bgyid pa 'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_skye mched drug rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_reg pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_tshor ba rgya chen 
[\[273a.5\]]por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_sred pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_len pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_srid pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_skye ba rgya chen 
[\[273a.6\]]por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rga shi rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa rgya 
[\[273a.7\]]chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[273b.2\]]nang stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_phyi stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_phyi nang stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rgya chen por 
[\[273b.3\]]bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_chen po stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_don dam pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_'dus byas stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya 
[\[273b.4\]]chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 
[\[273b.5\]]'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 
[\[273b.6\]]'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 
[\[273b.7\]]'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_yang dag par spong ba rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur 
[\[274a.2\]]bgyid pa 'am/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_dbang po rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_stobs rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_byang 
[\[274a.3\]]chub kyi yan lag rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab 
[\[274a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 
[\[274a.5\]]'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par thar ba rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[274a.6\]]'jug pa dgu rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[274a.7\]]ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_ting nge 'dzin rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[274b.2\]]rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_snying rje chen po rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rgya chen por 
[\[274b.3\]]bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu rgya chen por bgyid pa 
[\[274b.4\]]'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_rang byang chub rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_
[\[274b.5\]]de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rgya chen por bgyid pa 'am/_rgya chung ngur bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[274b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshor ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'du shes mthu dang ldan par bgyid 
[\[274b.7\]]pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'du byed mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_/de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]mthu dag ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sna mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 
[\[275a.2\]]'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lce mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lus mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_yid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid 
[\[275a.3\]]pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sgra mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par 
[\[275a.4\]]bgyid pa 'am/_dri mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_ro mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_reg mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_chos mthu dang ldan 
[\[275a.5\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid 
[\[275a.6\]]pa 'am/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[275a.7\]]mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthu dang dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma 
[\[275b.2\]]mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mthu dang ldan 
[\[275b.3\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[275b.4\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 
[\[275b.5\]]tshor ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid 
[\[275b.6\]]pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[275b.7\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sa'i khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_chu'i khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_ma'i khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rlung gi khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_nam mkha'i khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par 
[\[276a.2\]]shes pa'i khams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ma rig pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_
[\[276a.3\]]mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'du byed mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par shes pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs mthu dang ldan par bgyid 
[\[276a.4\]]pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_skye mched drug mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_reg pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshor ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu 
[\[276a.5\]]ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_sred pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_len pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_srid pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 
[\[276a.6\]]'am/_skye ba mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rga shi mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[276a.7\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthu dang ldan 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par 
[\[276b.2\]]bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_phyi stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan 
[\[276b.3\]]par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_phyi nang stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_chen po 
[\[276b.4\]]stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_don dam pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'dus byas stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid 
[\[276b.5\]]pa 'am/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par 
[\[276b.6\]]bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_chos thams cad 
[\[276b.7\]]stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]bgyid pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_dngos 
[\[277a.2\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar 
[\[277a.3\]]gzhag pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_yang dag par spong ba rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 
[\[277a.4\]]'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_dbang po rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_stobs rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[277a.5\]]lag rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid 
[\[277a.6\]]pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms

[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu

[\[277b.3\]]dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid 
[\[277b.4\]]pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_bcom

[\[277b.6\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa

[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthu dang ldan par 
[\[278a.2\]]bgyid pa 'am/_mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/_de'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 'du shes can la byang chub ces bgyi ba ma mchis te/_de ni 'di ltar sems can skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[278a.3\]]phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/'du shes skye ba 
[\[278a.4\]]ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/'du byed skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[278a.5\]]tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/rna ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/sna skye ba ma 
[\[278a.6\]]mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/lce skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/lus skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba 
[\[278a.7\]]ma mchis par blta'o/_/yid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/sgra skye ba ma mchis pa'i 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/dri skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/_/ro skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma

[\[283a.2\]]rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/skye mched drug rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/reg pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i

[\[283a.4\]]pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/len pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/srid pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/
[\[283a.5\]]skye ba rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/rga shi rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma 
[\[283a.6\]]mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rang 
[\[283a.7\]]bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/bsam gtan gyi 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis 
[\[283b.2\]]pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab 
[\[283b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma 
[\[283b.4\]]mchis par blta'o/_/'du byas stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta 
[\[283b.5\]]'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis 
[\[283b.6\]]par blta'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par 
[\[283b.7\]]blta'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]par blta'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[284a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i 
[\[284a.3\]]slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i 
[\[284a.4\]]slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rang bzhin ma 
[\[284a.5\]]mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/dbang po rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/stobs rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i 
[\[284a.6\]]slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rang bzhin 
[\[284a.7\]]ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/bsam gtan rnams 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms

[\[284b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes

[\[284b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/snying rje chen po rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu

[\[285b\]]

[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab

[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o/_/chu'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par

[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/_
